main event: A brilliant yellow-green object with a trail of sparks was observed at 15,000 ft in the Sea of Okhotsk.
interesting points: The object appeared to pass near the trajectory and disappeared with a whitish-yellow flash., The duration of the observation was approximately 120 seconds., Multiple military personnel, including a pilot and gunner, described the sighting of a similar flash and flare-like object., There were reports of a blue-green flare-like object that moved uniformly towards the aircraft., The reports suggested no known missile activity in the area at that time.
location: Sea of Okhotsk, USSR, Japanese Area
